column5: Hi everyone!  We are going thru cabin fever right now, So thinking maybe we might go to Cooks Bay this Tuesday.... Is dock fishing doing any good right now, we have a private spot we go to.... Unless there is a better spot you might want to share.... Don't really want to risk the canoe, kind of gives me the heebie jeebies........... Appreciate your input.... Maybe we might see some of you out there....  Lorissa

there have been lots of recent posts about the OFC members fishing at the marina in barrie for perch and they have been doing quite well,if you look a few pages back im sure you will able to find them...good luck cheers
